Detailed Description

Internal utility class used to parse an OBEX URL.

Warning:
This is an internal implementation class which must not be used outside APOXI OBEX at all.

It extracts the APOXI-specific part of an OBEX URL which is an extension of the format defined by the Java JSR-82 specification. The extension is mainly required to be able to specify an OBEX TARGET which is needed for logical addressing of incoming server connections.

ObexResult ObexUrlStrParser::ParseTarget (  ByteBuffer &  out_val  ) 
 

Extracts a TARGET specifiation from the OBEX URL.

Parameters:
Reference to a bytebuffer object where the result is stored in case of success. Any previous content will be overwritten. When no TARGET is specified by the URL the length of the bytebuffer is set to '0'.
Returns:
ObexResult which evaluates to 'TRUE' when parsing was successfull, 'FALSE' otherwise.
